sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fix_3944c4601b9190102b58ec67bc4bcb1f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><before>false</before><description>fix form layout issue on x_snc_feature_roll_feature_rollout</description><flush_cache>false</flush_cache><name>feature rollout fix form layout</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><run_once>true</run_once><script><![CDATA[//delete UI form section

var uiForm = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_form');
uiForm.addEncodedQuery('name=x_snc_feature_roll_feature_rollout');
uiForm.query();
while (uiForm.next()) {
    var uiFormSection = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_form_section');
    uiFormSection.addQuery('sys_ui_form', uiForm.getUniqueValue());
    uiFormSection.query();
    uiFormSection.deleteMultiple();
	uiForm.deleteRecord();
}

var formSection = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_section');
formSection.addEncodedQuery('name=x_snc_feature_roll_feature_rollout');
formSection.query();
formSection.deleteMultiple();

//delete customization
var customization = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
customization.addEncodedQuery('name=sys_ui_section_6406bdcedbe0b300ae4cdda5ca9619c0^ORname=sys_ui_form_sections_90d7f30adb059810e76ddb85ca9619ec^ORname=sys_ui_section_1881980fdba4b300ae4cdda5ca96196f');
customization.query();
customization.deleteMultiple();]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-06-06 00:40:00</sys_created_on><sys_id>3944c4601b9190102b58ec67bc4bcb1f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>feature rollout fix form layout</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Feature Rollout" source="x_snc_feature_roll">00c5b18edbe0b300ae4cdda5ca96192b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Feature Rollout">00c5b18edbe0b300ae4cdda5ca96192b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3944c4601b9190102b58ec67bc4bcb1f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-06-08 23:39:49</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
